value.name: Language
value.comment: Set the display language of main program.

value.name: UpdateInterval
value.comment: Set the update interval. Set "Never" to disable updates.

value.name: AllowUserDefinedProfiles
value.comment: Enable to allows own user profiles next to the shared profiles

value.name: DisableAccountsTab
value.comment: Activate to disable accounts tab. This disables the functionality to add, remove or change accounts.

value.name: DisableApplicationSettings
value.comment: Activate to disable the access to the whole application settings.

value.name: DisableDebugTab
value.comment: Activate to disable debug tab. This disables the functionality to run test jobs and change the debug level.

value.name: DisableHistory
value.comment: Activate to disable the job history.

value.name: DisableLicenseExpirationReminder
value.comment: Activate to never show a reminder of an upcoming license expiration.

value.name: DisablePrinterTab
value.comment: Activate to disable printer tab. This disables the functionalities to add/delete/rename PDFCreator printers, change profile assignments and set the primary pdfcreator printer.

value.name: DisableProfileManagement
value.comment: Activate to completely disable the editing of profiles.

value.name: DisableRssFeed
value.comment: Activate to disable the rss news feed.

value.name: DisableTitleTab
value.comment: Activate to disable title tab. This disables the functionality to change title replacements.

value.name: DisableUsageStatistics
value.comment: Activate to completely disable the anonymous usage statistics.

value.name: HidePdfArchitectInfo
value.comment: Activate to hide information about our customizable PDF Editor.

value.name: LoadSharedAppSettings
value.comment: Activate to load application settings from ini file in "%ProgramData%\pdfforge\PDFCreator". This is activated by default and must be explicitly disabled.

value.name: LoadSharedProfiles
value.comment: Activate to load profiles from ini file in "%ProgramData%\pdfforge\PDFCreator". This is activated by default and must be explicitly disabled.
